name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-sp-pnp-js-property-decorators
title: Using PnP JS Core custom objects with @select and @expand decorators
shortDescription: This web part demonstrates how to use PnP JS Core Custom Objects with @select and @expand TypeScript decorators.
longDescription: This web part demonstrates how to use PnP JS Core Custom Objects with @select and @expand TypeScript decorators.

thumbnails.alt: Using PnP JS Core custom objects with @select and @expand decorators

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
